b055fe71-d354-481c-9a9d-786cdf38c3e4:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"b055fe71-d354-481c-9a9d-786cdf38c3e4","title":{"en":"Fire Emblem - The Sacred Stones"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Fire Emblem The Sacred Stones Promotional Comic"},{"en":"Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones Comic"},{"en":"ファイアーエムブレム 聖魔の光石"}],"relatedIdds":["99830840-8b6f-479f-8524-d220ba162007","b7119473-48c9-41f3-97b1-4550580d242c"],"description":{"en":"The Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones Comic is a comic made in a collaboration between Nintendo, Udon Comics, and Gamepro.com. This is a promotional comic that used to be hosted on Gamepro.com that shows a battle occurring before Renais is taken over by Grado. It was part of a promotional campaign involving a number of gaming websites that ran a few weeks before the game's North American release.  \n  \nThe protagonist is an unnamed high-ranking commander of Renais, who is shocked at Grado's sudden betrayal. Though he is able to defeat the enemy leader by disarming him, he is too late to save Renais, as Glen and Valter appear before them (strangely on horses rather than their usual mounts) with a large army. She decides to move in with the mangaka, and help him in his day to day life in return for more drawings from him.","ru":"Ёкай, замаскированный в человеческую кожу?!  \r\nГахи-чан - монстр, который может как питаться, так и изменять свой облик при помощи рисунков, которые она ест.  \r\nНайдя выброшенные работы мангаки-любителя, Некотару, она влюбляется во вкус его работ, после чего решает во что бы то ни было разыскать самого мангаку, дабы получить больше его работ.  \r\nПосле того, как она находит его, она решает помогать ему в повседневной жизни в обмен на новые рисунки."},"links":{"al":"124671","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0B9R1G3Z5","ap":"gahi-chan","bw":"series/315497","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/652982/","engtl":"https://yenpress.com/9781975348663/gahi-chan-vol-1/","kt":"58675","mal":"130280","mu":"172508","raw":"https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM06201927010000_68/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"2d1f5d56-a1e5-4d0d-a961-2193588b08ec","name":{"en":"Loli"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}}]}

b117a6de-874c-4083-ae15-b9389c3c7f95:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"b117a6de-874c-4083-ae15-b9389c3c7f95","title":{"en":"God Pretender"},"altTitles":[{"zh-ro":"Chong Shen Bang"},{"en":"Full Lists of Gods"},{"vi":"Sung Thần Bảng"},{"zh-hk":"充神榜"},{"zh-ro":"Chōng Shén Bǎng"},{"ar":"مُدّعي الألوهية"},{"th":"เทพวิบัติ"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Plot is about a master and disciple pair of travellers that are crossing a desert/wasteland and find a remote village. Spútaná je nútená spievať šľachticom, až kým nezomrie. Kým ju démonizovaný veľkovojvoda Lloyd Valentine oslobodí, je už neskoro. Už vydýchla naposledy... alebo si to aspoň myslí. Keď sa Aria prebudí v minulosti, zasvätí svoj život ochrane vojvodu, ale rozmýšľa, či je to naozaj všetko, za čo jej krátky život stojí. Bude niekedy slobodná? To Grand Duke Valentine who was said to have sold his soul to the devil. So she could protect herself and him.\n\n\"Marry me.\"\n\nAria passed him a note which asked for his hand in marriage with her little maple leaf like hands.\n\n\"It's a contract marriage so we'll divorce 10 years later...\"\n\nThe young master grabbed the note Aria was writing and ripped it to shreds.\n\n\"So where do I stamp it?\"\n\n\"You told me you'll divorce me once we're older.\"\n\nThe young devil grew up and kissed her forehead.\n\n\"Since we have become adults, we have to instead make a contract for adults.\"\n\n---\n“If there is a next life, I will save you.”\n\nAria is the last remaining siren, a monster who bewitches humans with song. Shackled, she is forced to sing to nobles until she coughs blood. By the time the demonized Grand Duke Lloyd Valentine frees her, it’s too late. She has already breathed her last… or so she thinks. When she awakens in the past, Aria dedicates her life to protecting the duke, but she wonders if that’s really all her life is worth. Will she ever be free? Or is this siren destined to sing the same song forever?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%84%B8%EC%9D%B4%EB%A0%8C-%EC%95%85%EB%8B%B9%EA%B3%BC-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD%EA%B0%80%EC%A1%B1%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EB%8B%A4/2745), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57860238)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-siren-becoming-the-villains-family/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com?contentId=167)\n* [Chinese (Traditional / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/TheSiren%EF%BC%9A%E6%83%A1%E9%BB%A8%E7%9A%84%E5%A5%91%E7%B4%84%E5%AE%B6%E4%BA%BA/284)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/411)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Siren-Becoming-the-Villains-Family/65)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/95093)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The_Siren__%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%8B%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99/330)","fr":"Aria est la dernière des Sirènes, dont le chant ensorcelle les humains. Enfermée dans la cage de l'Empereur, elle doit chanter jusqu'à la mort. Lorsque le duc de Valentine, noble maudit et habité par un démon, lui propose de tuer toute la cour pour la libérer, Aria, déjà condamnée, accepte. Mais avant de rendre son dernier souffle, elle revient dans le passé, à l'année de ses dix ans. Di saat dia hampir mati, Lloyd, grand duke iblis datang dan membawa Aria keluar dari kandang burung. Saat itu Aria berpikir... \"Kalau ada kehidupan selanjutnya, aku akan menolongmu.\" Ketika ia membuka mata, Aria kembali pada waktu di mana dia berusia 10 tahun. Aria è l'ultima sirena rimasta e, con il suo canto, incanta gli esseri umani. Rinchiusa ed incatenata, è costretta a cantare per i nobili fino al punto di tossire sangue. Quando il \"demone\" Granduca Lloyd la salva è ormai troppo tardi ed Aria esala l'ultimo respiro tra le sue braccia. Quando si risveglia, Aria si ritrova nel suo corpo di bambina di 10 anni. Decide così di prendere in mano la sua vita e di dedicarla alla protezione del Granduca, in segno di gratitudine per averla salvata. Ma Aria sarà mai davvero libera?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** um nome derivado de uma criatura antiga, usado para descrever aqueles que podem encantar, atrair, controlar e curar os outros cantando. Anos atrás, uma sereia chamada Sophia foi sequestrada pelo conde Cortez como sua preciosa sereia, e uma garota chamada Aria nasceu logo depois como sua filha. Sujeita a viver a vida de uma sereia, Aria experimentou, viu e ouviu muitas coisas horríveis. Outros fariam qualquer coisa para ouvi-la cantar, ao ponto da insanidade. O imperador, que ficou obcecado por ela, quebrou suas pernas e a trancou em uma gaiola dentro do palácio imperial para escondê-la e mantê-la para si mesmo. Despedaçada terrivelmente, Aria se resignou à morte, quando de repente - O Arquiduque Diabólico, Lloyd Cardenis Valentine, chegou e sussurrou: \"Devo matar todos aqui? Se precisar de mim, é só me chamar. Sua música sempre me alcançará, onde quer que você esteja.\" No final, Aria chamou o diabo, levando a morte a todos os presentes, exceto ela mesma. \"Vamos cair no inferno juntos.\" E com isso, Aria deu seu último suspiro e morreu... apenas para voltar a ser como era há 10 anos. Agora que ela tem uma segunda chance em sua vida, Aria está determinada a mudar seu destino, assim como o futuro cruel de seu salvador, o arquiduque Valentine. Ela lhe propõe um contrato de casamento, com o divórcio planejado 10 anos depois, mas ele tem outros planos...\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** b1615da2-5e7b-4ee3-964d-dc5f3ae7109a:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"b1615da2-5e7b-4ee3-964d-dc5f3ae7109a","title":{"en":"Morahara Sarezuma no Shita Fukushuu"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"モラハラサレ妻のシタ復讐"},{"ja-ro":"Morahara Sarezuma no Shita Fukushuu"}],"description":{"en":"Kaoru Takatsuki is a full-time housewife at the behest of her husband Seiji. She is trying to be frugal in order to finance the education of her son Mamoru, who is in elementary school. She even hesitates to buy a nail polish that costs only 300 yen. Even so, when she dutifully submits her shopping receipts to Seiji each day, he chides her for being extravagant. He also forces her to perform one-sided services in the bedroom every night, telling her to \"fulfill her duties as a wife\". b16e3c54-8326-47fa-9af8-b7a75e2d3338:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"b16e3c54-8326-47fa-9af8-b7a75e2d3338","title":{"en":"Goshu Wushuang"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Skill Unparalleled"},{"ru":"Непревзойдённое боевое искусство"},{"zh":"国术无双"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["ru","pt-br"],"description":{"ru":"Расположившийся в городке Хайчэн бойцовский клуб «Небесные воины» — это филиал самого большого в мире боксёрского клуба. Сирота Су Чэнь, ради того, чтобы заработать денег на лечение своей названной младшей сестрёнки, устраивается туда спарринг-партнёром. Будучи очень способным в обучении и сообразительным малым, Су Чэнь становится «спарринг-партнёром золотой медали» клуба. Успехи Су Чэня не проходят бесследно — они вызывают лютую зависть со стороны капитана команды Ван Тинвэя, который строит ему козни. Но невзирая на опасную историю, в которую его втянули, Су Чэнь хочет не только остаться в живых, но и использовать появившиеся шансы достигнуть ещё больших высот на своём профессиональном поприще."},"links":{"mu":"152883","raw":"http://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/631580"},"originalLanguage":"zh","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"69964a64-2f90-4d33-beeb-f3ed2875eb4c","name":{"en":"Sports"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}}]}

نافييا ، اللتيي كانت معللقة عللى عاطفة عائللتها ، تبذلل قصارى جهدها للتصبح إمبراطورة أثناء تعرضها للسوء اللمعامللة ، وللكن فيي اللللحظة اللتيي ييتم فييها عللاج فييفييان ، ابنة اللدوق اللبييوللوجيية ، تخللت عائللتها عنها. للا ، سييكون من اللعدلل أن نقولل إنهم تخللوا عنها فيي كلل مرة. “كم من اللوقت ييجب أن أجرب؟ أن تكون عائللتك “. خللعت نافييا قفازاتها اللمللطخة باللدماء. ثم عللى معصمها اللأييمن ، تم اللكشف عن رقم غيير مرئيي للم ييكن مرئييًا للللآخريين. 1 باللنظر إللى اللأرقام ، اعترفت بهدوء. “اللآن ، سأتوقف عن اللللعب باللأللعاب اللعائلليية.” فيي تللك اللللحظة ، تغيير اللرقم عللى اللمعصم. 0 هكذا بدأت اللحيياة من جدييد. “إذا للمستنيي ، عللييك أن تدفع اللثمن.” هلل ستكون قادرة عللى اللانتقام من دوق أغنييس واللعثور عللى أسرة مؤقتة للحماييتها حتى بللوغها سن اللرشد؟\n\n---\n[Original from a poor, rural orphanage by a wealthy duke, Naviah Agnus wanted nothing but to win her new father’s heart. Despite her best efforts, the calculating Duke only sees Naviah as a pawn, a mere stand-in for his terminally ill daughter Vivian, who was set to marry the crown prince. But when Vivian miraculously recovers, Naviah is pushed aside and driven to her own death. When she wakes up, she is eight-years old again, but this time, Naviah is done playing nice. Can they ever really become family?\n\n---\n\"Navia Agnes,\" adopted to marry the Crown Prince on behalf of Duke Agnes's daughter with a time limit. \n\n“I really want to be family.”\n\nNavia, who held on to her family’s affection, did her best to become an Empress even while being abused. However, once Vivian, the Duke’s real daughter, is cured, she is abandoned by her family. No, it would be right to say that she was abandoned on all occasions.\n\n“Just how much more effort do I have to make? If I want to be your family,” Navia took off her blood-soaked gloves. \n\nThen on her right wrist, a number that couldn’t be seen by others appeared. \n\n\"1\" \n\nShe calmly admitted, looking down on the number, “I’m going to stop playing with my family now.”\n\nAt that moment, the number on her wrist changed. \n\n\"0\" \n\nJust like that, her life began again. \n\n“If you messed with me, you’re gonna pay for it.”\n\nWill she be able to find a temporary family who will protect her until she becomes of age, and get revenge on Duke Agnes?\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/54747988)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9A%B0%EB%A6%AC%EA%B0%80-%EA%B0%80%EC%A1%B1%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%A0-%EC%88%98-%EC%9E%88%EC%9D%84%EA%B9%8C%EC%9A%94/2972), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57809482)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/can-we-become-family/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com?contentId=151\u0026platform=AA\u0026adtag=appshare.android.detail%2526%25E5%2585%25B6%25E4%25BB%2596%2526151)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%88%91%E5%80%91%E8%83%BD%E6%88%90%E7%82%BA%E4%B8%80%E5%AE%B6%E4%BA%BA%E5%97%8E/261)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/266)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Can-We-Become-Family/280)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82445)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B0%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%89%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B0/295)","fr":"Huit vies misérables, à se couper en quatre pour satisfaire la moindre des exigences de sa famille d'adoption. Huit morts tragiques, trahie par cette même famille factice. Cette fois, c'en est trop! Naviah a fini de jouer la poupée sage et docile, c'est l'heure de la vengeance! Mais prudence, la maison Agnis pourrait bien ne pas être la plus grande menace dans cette neuvième vie... Quelle peut bien être cette présence malveillante qui semble l'observer depuis un sombre recoin de l'espace-temps...?\n\n---\nNavia Agnès est une orpheline adoptée pour épouser le prince héritier et remplacer la fille malade du duc d'Agnès.\n\n«Je voulais juste une vraie famille.»\n\nNavia fait son possible pour obtenir l'affection de sa famille et devenir une bonne impératrice tout en étant maltraitée, mais au moment où Vivian, la fille biologique du duc, est guérie, sa famille adoptive l'abandonne. Et pas qu'une fois, il serait juste de dire que cela est devenu une habitude.\n\n«Combien de fois dois-je encore essayer? Comment avoir enfin une vraie famille?»\n\nNavia enlève ses gants imbibés de sang et sur son poignet droit, un numéro visible par elle seule est révélé.\n\n«Un.»\n\nRegardant le chiffre, elle se calme et décide d'arrêter les jeux de familles. Au moment de sa décision, le numéro sur son poignet change.\n\n«ZÉRO.»\n\nC'est le début d'une nouvelle vie, le commencement pour trouver une nouvelle famille et le départ d'une vengeance.\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/54747988)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9A%B0%EB%A6%AC%EA%B0%80-%EA%B0%80%EC%A1%B1%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%A0-%EC%88%98-%EC%9E%88%EC%9D%84%EA%B9%8C%EC%9A%94/2972), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57809482)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/can-we-become-family/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com?contentId=151\u0026platform=AA\u0026adtag=appshare.android.detail%2526%25E5%2585%25B6%25E4%25BB%2596%2526151)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%88%91%E5%80%91%E8%83%BD%E6%88%90%E7%82%BA%E4%B8%80%E5%AE%B6%E4%BA%BA%E5%97%8E/261)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/266)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Can-We-Become-Family/280)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82445)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B0%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%89%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B0/295)","id":"Aku sudah berusaha. Namun suatu hari aku kembali terbangun. aku seharusnya sudah mati... tapi kenapa aku kembali menjadi kecil lagi? Apa ini kesempatan tambahan untuk menjadi anggota keluarga agnus? Atau justru balas dendam karena aku sudah muak?\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/54747988)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9A%B0%EB%A6%AC%EA%B0%80-%EA%B0%80%EC%A1%B1%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%A0-%EC%88%98-%EC%9E%88%EC%9D%84%EA%B9%8C%EC%9A%94/2972), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57809482)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/can-we-become-family/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com?contentId=151\u0026platform=AA\u0026adtag=appshare.android.detail%2526%25E5%2585%25B6%25E4%25BB%2596%2526151)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%88%91%E5%80%91%E8%83%BD%E6%88%90%E7%82%BA%E4%B8%80%E5%AE%B6%E4%BA%BA%E5%97%8E/261)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/266)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Can-We-Become-Family/280)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82445)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B0%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%89%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B0/295)","ko":"아그니스 공작의 시한부 딸을 대신하여\n황태자와 결혼하기 위해 입양된, '나비아 아그니스'\n\n\"진짜 가족이 되고 싶어요.\"\n\n가족의 애정에 목을 맸던 나비아는\n학대를 받으면서도 황후가 되기 위해 최선을 다하지만,\n공작의 친딸인 비비안의 병이 낫는 순간, 가족들에게 버려진다.\n\n아니, 그 때마다 버려졌다는 것이 맞을 것이다.\n\n\"대체 얼마나 더 노력해야 하는 걸까요? 당신들의 가족이 되려면.\"\n\n나비아는 피에 젖은 장갑을 벗었다.\n그러자 오른 손목에 남들에게는 보이지 않는 숫자가 드러났다.\n\n1\n\n그녀는 숫자를 내려다보며 담담히 고백했다.\n\n\"이제 가족 놀이는 그만하려고요.\"\n\n그 순간, 손목의 숫자가 바뀌었다.\n\n0\n\n그렇게 다시 시작된 삶.\n\n\"나를 건드렸다면, 대가는 치러야지.\"\n\n과연 그녀는 아그니스 공작가에 복수하고,\n성인이 될 때까지 자신을 보호해줄 임시 가족을 찾을 수 있을 것인가.\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/54747988)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9A%B0%EB%A6%AC%EA%B0%80-%EA%B0%80%EC%A1%B1%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%A0-%EC%88%98-%EC%9E%88%EC%9D%84%EA%B9%8C%EC%9A%94/2972), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57809482)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/can-we-become-family/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com?contentId=151\u0026platform=AA\u0026adtag=appshare.android.detail%2526%25E5%2585%25B6%25E4%25BB%2596%2526151)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%88%91%E5%80%91%E8%83%BD%E6%88%90%E7%82%BA%E4%B8%80%E5%AE%B6%E4%BA%BA%E5%97%8E/261)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/266)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Can-We-Become-Family/280)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82445)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B0%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%89%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B0/295)","pt":"Navia Agnes foi adotada para se casar com o príncipe herdeiro em nome da filha do duque Agnes, como uma forma de ganharem tempo. “Eu realmente quero ter uma família.” Navia, que se apegou ao afeto de sua família, fez o possível para se tornar uma imperatriz, mesmo sendo abusada. No entanto, uma vez que Vivian, a verdadeira filha do duque, é curada, ela é abandonada por sua família. Não, seria correto dizer que ela foi abandonada em todas as ocasiões. “Quanto mais esforço tenho que fazer? Se eu quiser fazer parte dessa família? ” Navia tirou as luvas encharcadas de sangue. Então, em seu pulso direito, um número que não podia ser visto por outras pessoas apareceu. Ela admitiu calmamente, olhando para o número: “Desta vez, vou parar de brincar de família com vocês.” Naquele momento, o número em seu pulso mudou. Só assim, sua vida começou de novo. \"Se você mexer comigo, irá pagar por isso.\" Ela será capaz de encontrar uma família temporária que a protegerá até que atinja a maioridade para se vingar do duque Agnes?\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/54747988)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9A%B0%EB%A6%AC%EA%B0%80-%EA%B0%80%EC%A1%B1%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%A0-%EC%88%98-%EC%9E%88%EC%9D%84%EA%B9%8C%EC%9A%94/2972), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57809482)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/can-we-become-family/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com?contentId=151\u0026platform=AA\u0026adtag=appshare.android.detail%2526%25E5%2585%25B6%25E4%25BB%2596%2526151)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%88%91%E5%80%91%E8%83%BD%E6%88%90%E7%82%BA%E4%B8%80%E5%AE%B6%E4%BA%BA%E5%97%8E/261)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/266)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Can-We-Become-Family/280)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82445)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B0%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%89%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B0/295)","ru":"Нивия — приёмный ребёнок семьи Агнес. Её удочерили ради помолвки с наследным принцем, ведь настоящая дочь рода Агнес неизлечимо больна. Нивия посвятила всю себя этим людям, однако с выздоровлением дочери герцога Вивиан, в ней больше не нуждались.\n«Я же просто хотела жить всем вместе как семья. Сколько нужно было ещё усилий?» — подумала умирающая Нивия.\n«Я ненавидел тебя с самого начала», — с презрением в глазах произнёс её брат.\nВсе восемь жизней она хотела быть настоящей Агнес, но, видимо, стоило «перестать играть в семью». Осталась последняя попытка стать счастливой, однако уже не в этом доме.\n«Почему я была одержима этой семейкой?»\nСможет ли наша героиня отомстить герцогству Агнес? А главное, найдёт ли она новую и любящую семью?\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/54747988)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9A%B0%EB%A6%AC%EA%B0%80-%EA%B0%80%EC%A1%B1%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%A0-%EC%88%98-%EC%9E%88%EC%9D%84%EA%B9%8C%EC%9A%94/2972), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57809482)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/can-we-become-family/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com?contentId=151\u0026platform=AA\u0026adtag=appshare.android.detail%2526%25E5%2585%25B6%25E4%25BB%2596%2526151)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%88%91%E5%80%91%E8%83%BD%E6%88%90%E7%82%BA%E4%B8%80%E5%AE%B6%E4%BA%BA%E5%97%8E/261)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/266)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Can-We-Become-Family/280)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82445)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B0%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%94%E0%B9%89%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B0/295)","tr":"Ailesin'in sevgisine sarılan Navia, hırpalanırken bile bir imparatoriçe olmak için elinden geleni yaptı. Agnis” được nhận nuôi để kết hôn với Thái tử thay cho con gái mắc bệnh nan y của công tước Agnis.\n“Thật sự tôi muốn chúng ta trở thành gia đình.”\nNavia bị trói buộc vào tình cảm gia đình, cô vừa chịu ngược đãi vừa cố gắng hết sức để trở thành hoàng hậu nhưng ngay khi bệnh tình của Vivian được chữa khỏi, những người thân gia đình đó đã vứt bỏ cô.\nKhông, việc cô bị vứt bỏ khi đó cũng là điều đúng thôi.\n“Rốt cuộc thì tôi phải nỗ lực đến mức nào nữa chứ? để có thể trở thành người nhà của các người.”\nNavia tháo găng tay đẫm máu ra. lúc đó trên cổ tay phải của cô đã xuất hiện con số mà trước giờ cô vẫn giấu không để người khác nhìn thấy.\n1\nCô ấy nhìn con số và chầm chầm nói.\n“Từ giờ hãy chấm dứt trò chơi gia đình này đi.”\nKhoảnh khắc đó, con số trên cổ tay đã thay đổi.\n0\nVà thế là cô bắt đầu lại một cuộc sống mới.\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/54747988)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** 為了和皇太子結婚而被領養的“納維亞·阿格尼斯”\n\n“我想成為真正的家人” 為了家人的愛而絞盡腦汁的納維亞 雖然受到了虐待，為成為皇后盡了最大的努力， 但公爵的親生女兒薇薇安病好的瞬間，就被家人拋棄了。\n\n不，每當這時就會被拋棄。 “我到底還要付出多少努力？想要成為你們的家人的話。” 納維亞脫掉了沾滿鮮血的手套。\n\n右手手腕上露出了別人看不見的數字。 1 她低頭看著數字，平靜地說。 “我現在不想再玩家人遊戲了。”\n\n那一瞬間，手腕上的數字變了。 0 就這樣重新開始的人生。\n\n“惹了我，就得付出代價。” 究竟，她能否報復阿格尼斯公爵， 找到能保護她到成人的臨時家人。\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/54747988)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** Not long after, Musashi comes across Sasaki Kojiro, a boy from a wealthy family who also aims to do manga movies. No matter how many times the two team up and split off, and no matter how many times they drift off their paths and return to them, their future lies with manga movies.\n\nA retelling of the rivalry between Miyamoto Musashi and Sasaki Kojiro, but in 1950's Japan, as they venture into the worlds of anime production and manga magazines.\n\n---\n**Volume 55 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**","it":"(amazon italia):\n\nIspirato alle esperienze di Tezuka nel mondo dell’animazione, \"Il film è vivo!\" racconta la storia di Musashi, un giovane disegnatore che sogna di fare film animati. Le sue prime prove a Tokyo, però, sono tutt’altro che idilliache: Dan Matsuma, regista di lungo corso, boccia i suoi lavori criticandone la scarsa vitalità. Musashi, tuttavia, non si dà per vinto e continua a impegnarsi per realizzare il suo sogno, fino a quando si imbatte nella figlia di un capo yakuza. Il clan, per tenerlo lontano dalla ragazza, dà fuoco allo studio di Musashi, che nel rogo riporta gravi ferite agli occhi. Grazie al suo tratto ipercinetico e a un innato senso per il melodramma, Tezuka ha riversato in queste pagine le folli rivalità e l’ossessiva ricerca della perfezione che permeavano il mondo del fumetto e dell’animazione giapponese, un campo di battaglia su cui non era raro morire di troppo lavoro."},"links":{"al":"52206","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/zh/dp/B00JPXE4KA/ref=sr_1_2?__mk_zh_CN=%E4%BA%9A%E9%A9%AC%E9%80%8A%E7%BD%91%E7%AB%99\u0026crid=3R1YBB2H25CUP\u0026keywords=%E3%83%95%E3%82%A3%E3%83%AB%E3%83%A0%E3%81%AF%E7%94%9F%E3%81%8D%E3%81%A6%E3%81%84%E3%82%8B\u0026qid=1650076983\u0026s=digital-text\u0026sprefix=%E3%83%95%E3%82%A3%E3%83%AB%E3%83%A0%E3%81%AF%E7%94%9F%E3%81%8D%E3%81%A6%E3%81%84%E3%82%8B%2Cdigital-text%2C113\u0026sr=1-2","ap":"film-wa-ikiteiru","bw":"defd1214a9-e6e4-4101-a527-db08ce0ff1e5","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-1682206?s_ssid=e41430625a2d15d960","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/339466/","kt":"the-film-lives-on","mal":"22206","mu":"48835","raw":"https://www.fukkan.com/fk/CartSearchDetail?i_no=68322917"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"85daba54-a71c-4554-8a28-9901a8b0afad","name":{"en":"Mafia"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

Murder, robbery, and kidnapping - many incidents occur around them. And the three solve each of the many cases in a most surprising way - their appetite results in marvelous speculations! They eat at the murder scene. They eat on the track. They even eat dog food! They keep on eating and eating, not even listening to the witness. Everywhere they go, they eat and eat and eat! And every time after finishing, the criminal appears. KUITAN is the words “Big-Eating” and Detective combined together. “Real Gourmet” plus “Real Mystery”. The big-eating detectives are on the run, solving cases from their deep knowledge about food."},"links":{"al":"50268","ap":"kui-tan","kt":"9022","mal":"20268","mu":"16845"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"df33b754-73a3-4c54-80e6-1a74a8058539","name":{"en":"Police"}},{"id":"ea2bc92d-1c26-4930-9b7c-d5c0dc1b6869","name":{"en":"Cooking"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

After the sudden death of the lord of their household, Duke Den, the twins Damian and Chloe become puppets at the hands of their relatives. Controlled by dark magic, Damian becomes the empty-shelled lord of the household while Chloe, who has a natural talent for swordsmanship, becomes an assassin repeatedly committing unwanted murders. Later deemed no longer useful, she falls to dark magic and kills Damian with her hands before meeting her own tragic ending afterward. However, when she opened her eyes once more, she returned to the past. To the past – the day of her beloved father’s, Duke Den’s funeral. From then, Chloe made a decision. A decision to not allow her past life to repeat itself... and to punish her relatives and the vassals who dared turn their backs on her family.\n\n---\n“So many things would have been different if you had become the family head…”\n\n*My older twin brother died at my hands.*\n\nChloe, who was controlled by black magic and forced to murder endlessly against her will, ultimately ends up killing her older twin brother. With barely a moment to mourn, the tip of her sword was immediately pointed at Chloe’s heart. Chloe died a miserable death. But when she opened her eyes again, she realized that she had gone back in time.\n\n*I won’t repeat my past life. In order to protect my family and my beloved older brother, I will personally become the master by becoming my brother.*\n\n“Look forward to it. You are the ones who pushed me to this point.”\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54824372), [Naver](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8629075), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057181273)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%BC%EC%95%97%EA%B8%B4-%EA%B0%80%EB%AC%B8%EC%9D%98-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%95%A9%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3182), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60828356)","id":"Duchy of Francesca memerintah provinsi utara atas nama keluarga Kekaisaran yang jatuh. Setelah kematian mendadak tuan rumah tangga mereka, Duke Den, si kembar Damian dan Chloe menjadi boneka di tangan kerabat mereka. Dikendalikan oleh sihir gelap, Damian menjadi penguasa rumah tangga yang bercangkang kosong sementara Chloe, yang memiliki bakat alami dalam ilmu pedang, menjadi seorang pembunuh yang berulang kali melakukan pembunuhan yang tidak diinginkan. Kemudian dianggap tidak lagi berguna, dia jatuh ke sihir hitam dan membunuh Damian dengan tangannya sebelum menemui akhir tragisnya sendiri sesudahnya. Namun, ketika dia membuka matanya sekali lagi, dia kembali ke masa lalu. Ke masa lalu - hari ayah tercintanya, pemakaman Duke Den. Sejak saat itu, Chloe mengambil keputusan. Keputusan untuk tidak membiarkan kehidupan masa lalunya terulang kembali .. dan untuk menghukum kerabatnya dan pengikut yang berani meninggalkan keluarganya.\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54824372), [Naver](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8629075), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057181273)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%BC%EC%95%97%EA%B8%B4-%EA%B0%80%EB%AC%B8%EC%9D%98-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%95%A9%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3182), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60828356)"},"links":{"al":"160150","engtl":"https://tapas.io/series/the-secret-of-house-francesca/info","mu":"z65orrn","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/content/60828356"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"292e862b-2d17-4062-90a2-0356caa4ae27","name":{"en":"Time Travel"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"9ab53f92-3eed-4e9b-903a-917c86035ee3","name":{"en":"Crossdressing"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

рассказывает об Иане Пэйдже, архимаге и первом человеке, который прорвался через уровень шестого класса, а затем и седьмого, став самым могущественным магом восьмого класса.\n\nПосле целой жизни, состоящей из войн и убийств, он сумел окончательно объединить континент. Состарившись, единственными его желаниями стали стремление прожить остаток жизни в мире и попытки найти спасение от горестей, привнесённых пролитой им кровью. Тем не менее его старый друг, обезумев от паранойи, не мог спокойно сосуществовать рядом с кем-то настолько сильным и предал Иана, убив его.\n\nНа последнем издыхании Иан использовал магию времени, которая переместила его в прошлое, в то время, когда он был маленьким мальчиком. Имея при себе все свои знания из прошлого, Иан решил сделать нечто большее, чтобы просто прожить жизнь с меньшим количеством сожалений.\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/8%ED%81%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%8A%A4-%EB%A7%88%EB%B2%95%EC%82%AC%EC%9D%98-%ED%9A%8C%EA%B7%80/2514), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57140255)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-return-of-the-8th-class-mage/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://podoteng.com)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/8%E7%B4%9A%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E5%B8%AB%E5%86%8D%E8%87%A8/231)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Return-of-the-8th-Class-Magician/559)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112773)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A_8/299)","tr":"Yıllarca Birleşik İmparatorluk ve kralı Ragnar için ellerimi kana buladım.\n\nGünahlarımdan arınmak için memleketime dönüp huzurlu bir şekilde yaşamak istedim.\n\nAncak…\n\n“Yüce bir 8. b2fc4630-bad7-432a-9657-96c276bb07e5:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"b2fc4630-bad7-432a-9657-96c276bb07e5","title":{"en":"Blue Earth"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Blue Beast"},{"ja-ro":"Aoi Kemono"},{"ja":"青いけもの"}],"lastChapter":"7","description":{"en":"(from ebookjapan):\nYuzuru Kazamatsuri, one of Japan's leading zoologists, received a request from the International Union for Conservation of Animals and Nature, of which he is a member, to conduct an investigation.
